QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, pac_mnt_projects.id odf_pk, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.DEPARTCODE as department_code, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSRATESOURCEEXPENSES as trans_rate_exp_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.COST_TYPE as cost_type, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.PROJECT_CODE as npio_code, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSRATESOURCELABOR as trans_rate_lbr_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TYPE_ as inv_fin_type, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.APPROVED as approved, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.LOCATIONID as location_code, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSCOSTSOURCEEQUIPMENT as trans_cost_eqp_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.CLASS as investment_class, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSRATESOURCEMATERIALS as trans_rate_mtl_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSCOSTSOURCEMATERIALS as trans_cost_mtl_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.EXPENSE_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE as exp_xchg_rate_type, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.BILLING_CURRENCY_CODE as bill_currency_code, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_object_code as odf_object_code, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSRATESOURCEEQUIPMENT as trans_rate_eqp_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.LABOR_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE as lbr_xchg_rate_type, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSCOSTSOURCEEXPENSES as trans_cost_exp_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.TRANSCOSTSOURCELABOR as trans_cost_lbr_src, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.STATUS as npio_status, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.WIPCLASS as wip_class, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.MASTER_PROJECT_CODE as master_project_code, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.MATERIALS_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE as mtl_xchg_rate_type, PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.EQUIPMENT_EXCHANGE_RATE_TYPE as eqp_xchg_rate_type, odf_ca_npiofinproperties.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from pac_mnt_projects PAC_MNT_PROJECTS JOIN odf_ca_npiofinproperties odf_ca_npiofinproperties ON odf_ca_npiofinproperties.id=PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.id where 1 = 1
